${ModID}:FancyDressPower.NAME: Fancy Dress
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, gain
block for each debuffed enemy. NL Playing a new Outfit will remove this power and add a #yFancy #yDress to your draw pile and reduce its cost by 1.

${ModID}:CharmPower.NAME: Charm
DESCRIPTIONS: When charm exceeds HP, this enemy fights for you.

${ModID}:EveningGlovesPower.NAME: Evening Gloves
DESCRIPTIONS: Block. NL Playing a new Accessory will remove this power and add a #yEvening #yGloves to your draw pile and reduce its cost by 1.

${ModID}:GownPower.NAME: Evening Gown
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a status, gain [E] [E] and draw
cards. Transforms into Shadow Veil when entering Demonic.

${ModID}:VeilPower.NAME: Shadow Veil
DESCRIPTIONS: When you Exhaust a Status, deal
damage to all enemies. Transforms into Evening Gown when exiting Demoic.
